contents:
be one with Yuri

Chinese fake media, fake students: Technology stolen...
Yuri Wang: His mind is weak... He belongs to us...
FBI: Yeah, baby...
Pig Xi: Comrade...
Huawei in Germany: Engineering... Engineering...
Hu Xijin: Warning: nuclear silo detected...
Trump on Twitter: Warning: nuclear weapon launched... ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚
